headline: Expand Energy (EXE) Price Target Cut to $137 at Piper Sandler
summary: Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) is included among the 10 Best American Oil and Gas Stocks to Buy. Formed in 2024 by the merger of Chesapeake Energy Corporation and Southwestern Energy Company, Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) operates as an independent natural gas production company in the United States. On January 28, Piper Sandler lowered its price […]

headline: Leucipa Rollout Strengthens Baker Hughes' Digital Energy Footprint
summary: BKR lands a multi-year deal with Expand Energy to deploy AI-powered Leucipa across shale wells, aiming to lift efficiency through real-time analytics.

headline: CNX Resources: The Company Will Do Fine, But Others Will Do Better
summary: CNX Resources Corporation has weak pricing and limited dry gas diversification as management trust concerns linger. See why CNX stock is a strong sell.
